00144 int nfs_Fsstat( nfs_arg_t         * parg,    
00145                 exportlist_t      * pexport, 
00146                 fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00147                 cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00148                 hash_table_t      * ht,
00149                 struct svc_req    * preq,    
00150                 nfs_res_t         * pres )   
00151 {
00152         static char         funcName[] = "nfs_Fsstat";
00153  
00154   fsal_staticfsinfo_t   staticinfo ;
00155   fsal_dynamicfsinfo_t  dynamicinfo ;
00156   cache_inode_status_t  cache_status ;
00157   cache_entry_t       * pentry = NULL ;
00158   fsal_attrib_list_t    attr;
00159   int                   rc = 0 ;
00160   
00161         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00162         {
00163                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00164                 pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resfail.obj_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00165         }
00166 
00167         /* convert file handle to vnode */      
00168   if( ( pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00169                                      &(parg->arg_lookup2.dir), 
00170                                      &(parg->arg_lookup3.what.dir),
00171                                      NULL,
00172                                      &(pres->res_statfs2.status),
00173                                      &(pres->res_fsstat3.status),
00174                                      NULL,
00175                                      NULL, 
00176                                      pcontext, 
00177                                      pclient, 
00178                                      ht, 
00179                                      &rc ) ) == NULL )
00180     {
00181       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00182       /* return NFS_REQ_DROP ; */
00183       return rc ;
00184     }
00185 
00186         /* Get statistics and convert from cache */
00187   
00188   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_statfs( pentry, 
00189                                            &staticinfo, 
00190                                            &dynamicinfo, 
00191                                            pcontext,
00192                                            &cache_status ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00193     {
00194       /* This call is costless, the pentry was cached during call to nfs_FhandleToCache */
00195       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry,
00196                                                 &attr, 
00197                                                 ht,
00198                                                 pclient, pcontext,
00199                                                 &cache_status ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00200         {     
00201 #ifdef  _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00202           printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> dynamicinfo.total_bytes = %llu dynamicinfo.free_bytes = %llu dynamicinfo.avail_bytes = %llu\n", 
00203                   dynamicinfo.total_bytes,  dynamicinfo.free_bytes,  dynamicinfo.avail_bytes ) ;
00204           printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> dynamicinfo.total_files = %llu dynamicinfo.free_files = %llu dynamicinfo.avail_files = %llu\n", 
00205                   dynamicinfo.total_files,  dynamicinfo.free_files,  dynamicinfo.avail_files ) ;
00206 #endif               
00207           switch (preq->rq_vers)
00208             {
00209             case NFS_V2:
00210               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.tsize  = NFS2_MAXDATA;
00211               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bsize  = DEV_BSIZE ;
00212               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.blocks = dynamicinfo.total_bytes / DEV_BSIZE ;
00213               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bfree  = dynamicinfo.free_bytes  / DEV_BSIZE ;
00214               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bavail = dynamicinfo.avail_bytes / DEV_BSIZE ;
00215               pres->res_statfs2.status = NFS_OK;
00216               break;
00217               
00218             case NFS_V3:
00219               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00220                                  pentry, 
00221                                  &attr,
00222                                  &(pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) );
00223               
00224               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tbytes = dynamicinfo.total_bytes;
00225               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.fbytes = dynamicinfo.free_bytes;
00226               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.abytes = dynamicinfo.avail_bytes;
00227               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tfiles = dynamicinfo.total_files;
00228               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.ffiles = dynamicinfo.free_files ;
00229               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.afiles = dynamicinfo.avail_files;
00230               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.invarsec = 0;        /* volatile FS */
00231               pres->res_fsstat3.status = NFS3_OK;
00232 
00233 #ifdef  _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00234               printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> tbytes=%llu fbytes=%llu abytes=%llu\n", 
00235                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tbytes,
00236                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.fbytes,
00237                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.abytes ) ;
00238               
00239               printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> tfiles=%llu fffiles=%llu afiles=%llu\n", 
00240                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tfiles, 
00241                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.ffiles, 
00242                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.afiles ) ;
00243 #endif           
00244 
00245               break;
00246 
00247             }
00248           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00249         }
00250     }
00251   
00252         /* At this point we met an error */
00253         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status) )
00254                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00255 
00256         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00257                        preq->rq_vers, 
00258                        cache_status,
00259                        &pres->res_statfs2.status,
00260                        &pres->res_fsstat3.status,
00261                        NULL, NULL,
00262                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00263                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00264   
00265         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00266 } /* nfs_Fsstat */
00267 
00276 void nfs_Fsstat_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00277 {
00278   /* Nothing to do here */
00279   return ;
00280 } /* nfs_Fsstat_Free */
